Section 5103 Notice for Infectious Disease Claims
It is unnecessary to issue Section 5103 notice when a Veteran files a new claim for SC for an infectious disease on a form that provides, or otherwise indicates the claimant received, the notice, such as
VA Form 21-526EZ, Application for Disability Compensation and Related Compensation Benefits
.
